name: Very low income single filer
description: Single person earning €15,000 - minimum wage scenario

sources.description: Calculated using official 2024 Belastingdienst rates - credits exceed tax
sources.notes: Tax: €5,545.50, General credit: €3,362, Labour credit: €1,288, Total credits exceed by €105, Net tax: €895, Net ≈ €14,105
